[vc_row el_class=”small row_padding_top row_padding_bottom has-animation”][vc_column]

About the Project

[vc_column_text]Instrument is a short personal project, which looks to redefine the two most common tools used in the household, a hammer and a set of screw drivers to be readily accessible for day to day uses for the urban individual.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Read More[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”full has-animation”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”row_padding_top row_padding_bottom has-animation”][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”one_third”]

The Challenge
